bhusati：[= bhasati] 吠える，ほえる．aor．bhusi; pp．bhusita．

Bhusati，Bhussati [perhaps a legitimate form for Sk．bhaṣate （see P．bhasati），with u for a，so that the suggested correction of bhusati to bhasati （see under bhasati） is unfounded] to bark DA．I，317 （bhusati; vv．ll．bhussati & bhūsati）; DhA．I，171，172．-- See also bhasati & bhukka; -- pp．bhusita．（Page 507）
bhusati：ဘုသတိ ဘုဿတိ
